MASTER_PAD_VERSION_INFO.MASTER_PAD_INFO: Portable Application Description, or PAD for short, is a data set that is used by shareware authors to disseminate information to anyone interested in their software products. To find out more go to http://www.asp-shareware.org/pad

Program_Info.Program_OS_Support: Windows2000,WinXP,Windows2003,Windows Vista Starter,Windows Vista Home Basic,Windows Vista Home Premium,Windows Vista Business,Windows Vista Enterprise,Windows Vista Ultimate
Program_Info.Program_Change_Info: Add “Tag Clouds” and “Auto-tagging”. ; Add Japanese template to the search interface. ; Add “Failed-URL Audit” ; Add a new module “Single-Sign On”. ; Support pre-1970 search time format.

English.Keywords: Search Engine, IR, Document Search, Site search, find file,Web page, KM, Database Search
English.Char_Desc_80: OES is designed for enterprise intranet heterogenous data search.
English.Char_Desc_250: Openfind Enterprise Search (OES) is designed for easy installation and simple configuration, allows setting up intranet heterogenous data search in minutes. OES shareware allows 30 indices and up to 50,000 documents per index.
English.Char_Desc_450: Openfind Enterprise Search (OES) is designed for easy installation and simple configuration, allows setting up intranet heterogenous data search in minutes. With multi-lingual search capability, OES can deal with double bytes as well as single bytes contents.OES shareware allows 30 indices and up to 50,000 documents per index.
English.Char_Desc_2000: Openfind Enterprise Search (OES) is designed for easy installation and simple configuration, allows setting up intranet heterogenous data search in minutes. With multi-lingual search capability, OES can deal with double bytes as well as single bytes contents. It supports mostly general file types, like web page, Microsoft Office file, Adobe PDF file, plain-text file, compressed file, multi-media file, and filename search as well. OES new version adds database search functionality and ACL mechanism. Moreover, OES also provides many useful functions to reduce the maintenance effort, like index/schedule management, real-time index progress and summary/detail report, etc. OES shareware allows 30 indices and up to 50,000 documents per index.
